appachchilata wenwela thibba rajakariya wune ee ayath ekka eyalage gam walata gihin dawas 2k 3k idala(bohowita pansale) game inna wagakiyayuthu ayath(gramaniladhariwaraya, widuhalpathiwaraya, pansale hamuduruwo, adala kenage demawpiyan, pawule aya, yalumithradin) ekka katha baha karala,ee kenawa nidahas karala nawatha gamata ewanna sudusu wathawaranayak thiyenawada kiyala hoyala balana eka.

palath palana mathiwaranayak labaganimata wuwa da sanwidhanayak awashya weyi.

esema palath palana mathiwaranaya dina niyamayak nomathiwa kal dama palath sabhawala bahuthara mathaya pilinoganna lesa aandukarunta niyoga kirimata siduwa aththeth janapriya sanwidhayakawarunge sanwidhayakakam galawa damimen nonawathi parlimenthu manthri dhuraya udura ganna bawata tharjanaya karannata siduwa aththeth noyekuth boru chodana ella kara usawi gane rasthiyadu karawanneth pakshaye balaya thahawuru kara ganimata obathumata me wanathuruma nohaki wu nisa bawa pahadiliya.

esema eya yojana kara aththe, siyalu prakashayata pathkarana lada adhyanayan, oppu nokala karunu walin walakwima sandaha wana walanguthawaya agaya kirime ho ehi sadhaka wala wishwasaniyathwaya manime wishayata anukula wiya yuthu bawayi.[21]wyapara aakruthin ilektronik parisarayen wen we. 1990ta pera sitama, ilektronik upakarana, wishesha jarnal walata balapathra nikuth kirima boho sulabha wiya.

thawamath ayata wiruddhawa chodana gonu kara natha. 2014 wasare marthu masa ma saha thawath katholika pujakawarayeku thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha yatathe athadanguwata gena chodanawak rahithawa nidahas kerune, jeyakumari mahathmiyage saha sirabaraye siti anekuth randewiyange thathwayan pilibandawa soya balima yana waradata wiya yuthuya.
